conbody.p: We spend too much time shuffling data between ourselves and our customers.

Example: moving files between Aci, Ryffine and BlueStream burnt far more time than just sending us a complete dump of the data in the first place. On the 4 occasions they sent us a zip full of files they managed to do things in a slightly different way each time which we then had to debug (at scale) to ameliorate the consequences.
Example: using ftp versus having the customer put all their files in Github, or S3, or onto an AWS instance i.e. in the cloud where we can work on them and the customer can see what we are doing.
